execution_plan.description: Retrieve all order items with their associated order_id and product_id from the orders database. This provides the membership of products per order so the application can compute order totals after obtaining product prices.
Retrieve product prices for all products referenced by the order items returned in step 1 from the products database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT product_id, product_price FROM Products WHERE product_id IN ($step1.product_id);
